title: [Documentation]: Document the command line switch from BuildCheck Stats
body:
### Summary

There is a functionality of BuildCheck introduced in the PR: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10016
However there is no documentation on the feature and what exactly it could provide.

### Proposed Feature

To add documentation to the https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/documentation/specs/proposed/BuildCheck-Architecture.md with the possibilities of the command line switch.
